 Well, remember you can always call me, darling.

pa: A little baby heart.

-Come on, anything. -I just don't feel like it.
 -Well, why not? -Sorry, I just…

pa: Maja…
vi: Maja…

pa: Seriously?

pa: I just think that…

pa:
this is really important and I, uh…
 I just feel like I'm watching from the sidelines.
vi: việc này rất quan trọng, và cứ như tôi chỉ đứng ngoài xem vậy.

en: Det gør du også kan man sige.

en: Jeg tror bare, jeg står lidt mere på sidelinjen end andre. Fordi…

en: …i teorien er det jo ikke mit barn.
pa:
because…
 in theory, it's not even my child.

pa: Yes.
vi: Vâng.

pa: when their babies are born.

pa: She's definitely the favourite even though I carried them.

And you know what, the way they…
 laugh and walk, and all that kind of stuff, they…

pa: they get it from her.
vi: chúng giống cô ấy.

Yeah, families come in different shapes and sizes.
 That's true.

A nice dad, a handsome dad.
